attributes.action: review the current tax credits system in order that 1. non resident parents have access to tax breaks if they are paying maintenance and 2. so the system is easier to understand, harder to end up owing money and thresholds and income limits are clearly explained.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the current system of tax credits is totally unfair.

the people who are working hard to be able to live and work without the need for government handouts are being failed by harsh briteria on thresholds and income limits. 

Non resident parents are also getting a raw deal, as they are expected to meet  the financial commitment of a child, who the may never see, or may never even have know about, yet theay have no claim tax credits, even though they may be worse off than the resident parent.
